column4: AbbVie oral hep C drugs cure 96 percent in late stage trial

column4: AbbVie says 96 pct patients in oral hepatitis C study show improvement
column5: Dec 10 AbbVie Inc said a late-stage trial of its experimental hepatitis C therapy showed 96 percent of the patients who had previously failed to respond to treatment had no detectable levels of the virus in the blood after 12 weeks.

column4: ADM sees 1 mln T grains through Brazil Amazon port in 2014
